text.text: Instead of separately investing money and technical effort to purchase and get the 3rd party modules to work with your email marketing system, MumaraClassic has collected set of advanced modules integrated to seamlessly work with its structure. So stop worrying about adding more speed using Multithreading, fetching Geo Location of openers/clickers, or creating right PowerMTA configuration, MumaraClassic has everything for an ideal high volume email sending infrastructure.
